'''''The New York Times Magazine'' 15 January 1967''' is an issue of ''[[Wikipedia:The New York Times Magazine|The New York Times Magazine]]''. 

The article "The Prevalence of Hobbits" by Philip Norman includes extracts from an [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien|interview with Tolkien]] (pp. 30-1, 97 and 100-2).

Another (similar but not identical) article based on the same interview was published on the same date in ''[[The Sunday Times Magazine 15 January 1967|The Sunday Times Magazine]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=53620|articlename=New York Times Magazine. 1967|dated=|website=TB|accessed=3 January 2012}}</ref>
